chunks.title: VAT Rates
chunks.content: Standard VAT: 12%. Zero-Rated: 0%. VAT-Exempt: N/A. Percentage Tax for non-VAT registered: 3%.

chunks.title: Corporate Income Tax (CREATE Law)
chunks.content: Regular Corporation (RCIT): 25%. Domestic Corporation (net taxable income ≤ PHP 5M AND total assets ≤ PHP 100M): 20%. Minimum Corporate Income Tax (MCIT): 2% of gross income. Proprietary educational institutions and non-profit hospitals: 10%.

chunks.title: Expanded Withholding Tax (EWT) Common Rates
chunks.content: Professional fees (individual): 5%/10%/15%. Professional fees (corporation): 10%/15%. Rental of real property: 5%. Rental of personal property: 5%. Commissions: 10%/15%. Advertising: 2%. Income payments to contractors/subcontractors: 2%.
